title: Determine Sales Tax Nexus
description: An e-commerce company is growing and needs to determine if it has established sales tax nexus in a new state.

tasks.description: Retrieve the economic nexus laws for the state in question (e.g., sales dollar threshold, transaction count).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the specific nexus criteria for the state.

tasks.description: Analyze the company's sales data for that state over the past 12 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates the total sales revenue and number of transactions in the state.

tasks.description: Compare the company's sales data to the state's nexus thresholds and advise the client if they need to register to collect sales tax.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the company has exceeded the economic threshold and must register.
